ref.mixed-citation:
Garber C
Soung A
Vollmer LL
T cells promote microglia-mediated synaptic elimination and cognitive dysfunction during recovery from neuropathogenic flaviviruses. Nat Neurosci 2019; 22: 1276– 1288. 31235930

note.p: This study determines that IFN-γ derived from T cells in the CNS impacts microglia activity resulting in postinfectious synaptic elimination and cognitive dysfunction.
